profile: Visit our new website: www.art-metal.ca We are a family owned and operated company manufacturing wrought iron railings and other iron products based in Toronto, Ontario. Our mission is to provide you with highest quality iron products at a low cost and to ensure your satisfaction with our product and service. Our core value: In today's construction business industry we encounter many companies who simply rush, cheat, and work around the right way of doing things. Having work done with utmost integrity, honesty, and compassion is our number one value in a project. We provide lifetime warranty on galvanized iron work. We also provide services for: fences & gates, patios & decks, floor refinishing

profile:
Shiner's Fencing and Contracting Ltd., a licensed Peel Fence Systems Dealer based in Newmarket, Ontario, serving all your fencing, safety and security needs since 1972.

We specialize in Wrought Iron and Chain Link systems for over 45 years. We have earned the trust of thousands of satisfied customers. From a simple chain link enclosure to keep your pet safe, to miles of Chain Link or Wrought Iron security fencing, we have done it all! Let us bring our years of experience to your projects.

Ensure your peace of mind for the safety of your family, pets and property. You can trust the professionals at PEEL FENCE for the right advice and personal service.

Visit our showroom or contact us for a free, no obligation quote.

You can trust the professionals at PEEL FENCE for the right advice and personal service. We are the trusted name all around your home.

profile:
FENCE CONTRACTOR IN BARRIE, ONTARIO

RESIDENTIAL
Make your neighbors jealous with our residential fences.

AGRICULTURAL
Get your farm fenced to ensure all your animals stay on your property.


COMMERCIAL
Keep intruders out and protect your business.

AUTOMATED GATES
Complete your fence with a fully automated gate. Control your gate with a phone call or text or a keypad. All types of electronic gates and doors are available.

FENCE REPAIR
Are your old fences falling or have they already fallen? We can take care of that.

DIG REQUEST? 
There can be critical infrastructure buried right beside your fence! A dig request will ensure everyone in the community is safe
